title: The use of third-party applications in conjunction with League- MKjogo/MK LOL
body:
I recently received a warning from Riot, 'warning' me about my use of the third-party League of Legends Add-on thingy (called MK Jogo)... Now the application literally only grants the user an alternative cursor to replace the outdated league cursor, offline skins (skins from the game that only show up for the user), a quick message option (which sucks because it lags the game), a jungle timer which is pretty much the same as the one in game right now and some in-game recording thing... so I want to know if I should take the warning seriously or legit completely stop using the application??? P.S (just going to quote what the email said) "For now, this is a warning, but continued use of the program will result in suspension placed against you, and may ultimately result in permanent account closure"





Additionally, the email also said, "this application automates several actions on your behalf, including chat and jungle timers." now I'd like to add that in order to use the quick message you have to "Ctrl+T" followed by a number to select a message which isn't automated, not to mention character restriction, as it only allows 20 characters to your message at which point you realize that you just wasted 4 seconds trying to use the "automated" action.   Now the jungle timer requires u to physically see the jungle creature die in order for the jungle timer to register which makes it 100% pointless in regards to gaining an advantage over the enemy team. So all in all, my question is should I completely remove my use of mkJogo (which I only use for the "offline" skins) or should I ignore the email?

replies.body:
Riot Eambo (EUW)  - 4 months ago
"Does it interfere with the ingame experience?" - Yes
"Does it provide an unfair advantage over other players without this tool?" - Yes

There's two very simple questions that answer yours. Whether you think a feature should or should not be available, if it's not available and you're using it, it's an unfair advantage.

A program that shortens the amount of work you have to do, or even that moves timers from the tab area to another area, is an unfair advantage. Other players do not have this, and it does infact give you a benefit over others - whether it's as simple as not having to press tab, or as complicated as automatically moving your character - all unfair advantages that interact with the game are just that.

This is from a rioter, I just can quote him but here 

Riot Eambo (EUW)
There is not (that I'm aware of), which is why it's highly recommended you do not use this program for any features if you value your account in any way. If you are using MKJogo, whether it's just because it looks pretty or for every feature that breaks the rules, there's no difference - you're still using this program.
Same thing for me, I only use the skin thing, I really want a rioter to reply so I'm going to bump this throughout the day

I also got the email. And cos of fearing of getting my account banned. I deleted it. I just want to use it for the skin :/. They gave the warning repeatedly though that the warning need to be taken seriously.
Can you send a screen from it, would be nice!

It seems like EVERYBODY that used it recently is getting a warning...i used it for 2 weeks but i disabled everything except the local skin....i read a lot about this program before using it to be sure it wouldn't cause me trouble and people asked to rioters if it was permitted to use it...the rioters said we could if the jungle thing was disabled....so i don't know why now it's proibited...it was fun while it lasted i jus t uninstalled it i can play without it
